    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name)
       throws TooManyPlayersException
        Initializes class variables

        Sets name and color for each of the pieces. Increases number of players and checks if greater than 3, if so throws error.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersException - Too many players created

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move​(int roll,
                 int index)
        Moves the players piece

        Stores the pieces old location, sets the piece to its new location. Checks if the new location == scored space, if so updates score.

        Parameters:
        roll - Player's roll
        index - Index of moving piece

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf​(int location)
        Returns the index of a piece at the requested location
        Parameters:
        location - location of a possible piece
        Returns:
        i index of a piece, -1 no piece at location

      • hasPieceAt

        public boolean hasPieceAt​(int location)
        Finds if the player has a piece at a location

        Uses indexOf() to see if return value is not -1

        Parameters:
        location - Location of a square
        Returns:
        boolean True if piece is at location, false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset​(int index)
        Resets a requested piece

        Calls {@link #Piece.reset()} on a players piece

        Parameters:
        index - Index of a player's piece

      • win

        public boolean win()
        Checks if the player reached the score to win
        Returns:
        boolean True if score is 7, false otherwise

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation​(int index)
        Gets the location of a requested piece

        Calls {@link #Piece.getLocation() Piece.getLocation()} to return the location of the requested piece

        Parameters:
        index - Index of a players piece
        Returns:
        int Location of the requested piece
